statements: SELECT student_name, gpa FROM StudentData WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StudentData WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentData ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, graduation_date FROM StudentData WHERE retention_status = true;
SELECT student_id, major, gpa FROM StudentData WHERE gpa >= 3.5 ORDER BY gpa DESC;
SELECT student_name, major, gpa FROM StudentData WHERE retention_status = true ORDER BY gpa DESC
SELECT * FROM StudentData WHERE major = 'Computer Science' AND gpa >= 3.0
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM StudentData WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT student_name, major, graduation_date FROM StudentData WHERE major LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY graduation_date ASC
SELECT AVG(gpa) AS avg_gpa, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM StudentData WHERE retention_status = false
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE graduation_date IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, graduation_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE graduation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(grade) AS total_grades FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_grades > 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS highest_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY highest_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM students LEFT JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT department, COUNT(course_id) AS course_count FROM courses GROUP BY department;
SELECT student_id, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM students GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(age) > 25 ORDER BY avg_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT year, retention_rate FROM RetentionRate WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Intro%';
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT year, semester, retention_rate FROM RetentionRate WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY semester DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, credits, department FROM Courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT course_id, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Mathematics' LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE gender='M' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth >= '1995-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credits, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE department='Computer Science' ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade='A' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_name, retention_rate FROM Students INNER JOIN RetentionRates ON Students.student_id = RetentionRates.student_id WHERE retention_rate > 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
